attributes.action: Extend expiry date for people who have passed their driving theory test
attributes.additional_details: People have not been able to have their driving lessons for months, and now dvla driving test centres are back logged so people are struggling to find a test centre to book their driving test
attributes.background: Extend the expiry date for extra 6 months so problem have more time to book their driving test

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for a similar action: 

Extend validity of the driving theory certificate from 2 to 4 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591842

Extend the DVSA Theory Test expiration by 3 months
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592839
